examdays

Calculate how many days will you have for preparing your exam

Navigation

Quick search

ExamplesÂ¶

Some examples here:

If your exam is on 2021,6,30, then:

from examdays import exam

exam(2021, 6, 30)

Or in Command Line:

$ examdays 2021 6 20

Output:

You still have: 6 days!
Good Luck!

With Colour:

$ examdays 2021 6 30 YELLOW

Or:

$ examdays 2021 6 30 blue
